DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : The objective study measure delineate symptom burden experience patient chronic myeloid leukemia ( CML ) . The Primary Aim develop validate M. D. Anderson Symptom Inventory ( MDASI ) module ( MDASI-CML ) , compliant FDA standard patient-reported outcome ( PROs ) , measure severity multiple symptom impact symptom daily function patient CML . The Secondary Aims : 1. develop detailed description severity interference daily activity symptom experience patient CML ; 2. assess impact symptom severity CML standard function quality life ( QOL ) measure include Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Performance Status single-item QOL scale ; 3. evaluate MDASI-CML estimate functional status QOL patient CML ; 4. identify common cluster symptom symptom pattern occur multiple measurement time point patient CML ; 5 , define qualitative symptom burden patient CML ; 6. explore feasibility Interactive Voice Response ( IVR ) system measure symptom severity interference daily activity time patient CML .
DOC.brief_title: Symptom Burden Chronic Myeloid Leukemia ( CML )
DOC.detailed_description: Part 1 : Interview : If agree take part study , clinic visit , interview like CML . The interview take 30 minute complete . Questionnaires : After interview , ask answer symptom questionnaire , quality-of-life questionnaire , demographic question age marital status . It take 10 minute complete 3 questionnaire . Length Study : After complete interview questionnaire , participation study . Additional Information : The interview digitally record . The electronic record interview name link kept secure server M. D. Anderson Cancer Center password protect . All study material destroy data analysis complete study result report . Information symptom collect study collect research purpose . If experience severe troublesome symptom , report doctor nurse well rating symptom assessment questionnaire . If data collector notice rat symptom severe , data collector ask doctor nurse aware symptom intend report symptom doctor nurse . If intend report symptom , data collector let know report symptom doctor nurse . This investigational study . Up 218 participant take part study . Up 40 enrol Part 1 study . All enrol MD Anderson . Part 3 : Symptom Questionnaires : If agree take part study , complete questionnaire symptom every 2 week 1 year . On questionnaire , ask rate level discomfort cause symptom symptom effect activity daily life . The symptom questionnaire take 5 minute complete . You complete questionnaire first study visit clinic visit every 3 month . In visit , call every 2 week complete questionnaire automate telephone system . You decide convenient time place automate phone system call . If available automated system call , call late time . You may also call automated system miss call . If reach automate phone system several try , study staff call . You give secure user name identification number use automate phone system . You show automate phone system work study staff . Two ( 2 ) day first visit , fill symptom questionnaire . You take home clinic pre-addressed , stamp envelope give research staff return . The research staff also ask telephone number may contact remind complete questionnaire . Quality-of-Life/Demographic Questionnaires : At first visit 3-month clinic visit , also rate overall quality-of-life . This take 1 minute complete . At first visit , also ask demographic question ( age marital status ) . Answering question take 1 minute . Opinion Questionnaire : If 1 first 30 patient enrol study , first visit also complete questionnaire opinion symptom questionnaire . For example , ask symptom questionnaire easy understand complete question include . The study staff use opinion decide important symptom question miss questionnaire . This questionnaire take 5 minute complete . Length Study : You study 1 year . Additional Information : The questionnaire use study number name link . All questionnaire study data keep locked cabinet time . All study material destroy data analysis complete study result report . Information symptom collect study collect research purpose . If experience severe troublesome symptom , report doctor nurse well rating symptom assessment questionnaire . If data collector notice rat symptom severe , data collector ask doctor nurse aware symptom intend report symptom doctor nurse . If intend report symptom , data collector let know report symptom doctor nurse . This investigational study . Up 218 participant take part study . Up 160 participant enrol Part 3 study . All enrol MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 18 year age old ( Patient family caregiver ) 2 . Ability speak read English ( All participant ) 3 . Live United States ( Patient Phase 3 ) 4 . Diagnosis Philadelphia chromosome positive CML confirm pathological cytogenetic analysis ( Patient ) 5 . Being follow M.D . Anderson Cancer Center ( Patient ) 6 . Consent participate ( All participant ) 7 . Treatment CML least 1 year ( Patient Phase 2 ) 8 . Family caregiver also willing receive packet expert panel participation ( Patient Phase 2 ) 9 . Physician nurse least 5 year experience care patient CML ( Professional expert ) 10 . At least one publication last 5 year deal CML ( Physician professional expert ) 11 . Identification family caregiver patient CML ( Family caregiver ) 12 . Patient also willing receive packet expert panel participation ( Family caregiver ) 1 . Medical condition impair performance status would preclude participation study ( Patient ) 2 . Diagnosis active psychosis severe cognitive impairment determine primary physician ( Patient )
